paragraphs.first: For technologies and architectures that cannot be adopted immediately in production, I form hypotheses, implement, and summarize validation results.
paragraphs.note: Note: The content here is for learning and validation, not finished products.
paragraphs.second: I record not only what worked but also the trial-and-error process and learnings.

header.description: Roles, contributions, and knowledge areas organized chronologically.
header.title: Experiences

metadata.description: Work history, contributions, knowledge, and tech stacks.
metadata.title: Experiences — Satoshi Ogura

contributions.first: Took on the challenge of 0-to-1 consumer business creation as the team and technical leader.

innoventure.product: Mobile app that auto-tags and organizes screenshots to support brainstorming and task reminders
innoventure.title: Team/Tech Lead SB Innoventure Corp.

contributions.first: Built the Napier V2 web frontend from scratch, largely on my own.
contributions.second: Supported the protocol’s growth, helping total value locked (TVL) scale from $0 to $40 million+.

napier.product: Modular DeFi protocol on EVM enabling permission-less yield tokenization and fixed-yield trading
napier.stack: TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, Wagmi, Viem, GraphQL, Zod, Neverthrow, Vercel, Sentry, Figma
napier.title: Frontend Engineer Napier Labs

contributions.first: Built both the frontend and backend of the Salon Brain platform almost entirely from scratch.
contributions.second: Supported MVP validation and helped scale the service from zero to 100+ contracted salons.

salon.product: CRM platform for beauty salons using LINE to automate customer engagement and improve retention
salon.stack: TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, React Firebase Hooks, Express, Firebase
salon.title: Fullstack Engineer Salon Brain Inc.

contributions.first: Coordinated system design and interface specifications with internal and external engineers.
contributions.second: Managed development schedules and cross-team tasks, taking external partners into account.

softbankPm.product: Gateway connecting the TBCASoft consortium blockchain (HIVEX) and legacy payment systems
softbankPm.stack: Java, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS
softbankPm.title: Technical PM SoftBank Corp.

contributions.first: Investigated the technical mechanisms of Uniswap, contract wallets, account abstraction, etc.
contributions.second: Developed POC prototypes for ticket and stamp rally NFTs for real-world implementation.
contributions.third: Considered wallet-centered Web3 strategies and regularly reported findings to senior stakeholders.

knowledge.second: Web3 business strategy in Web2 enterprises

softbankResearch.product: Conducted technical research and validation to formulate and plan enterprise Web3 strategy
softbankResearch.stack: Solidity, TheGraph, IPFS, Chainlink, TypeScript, React, Express, Amplify, AWS
softbankResearch.title: Tech Researcher SoftBank Corp.
